scripts.visualization: gource --hide dirnames,filenames,mouse,progress  --font-colour 87ceeb --highlight-colour BFC8D1 --disable-input --camera-mode overview --background 1b2634 --seconds-per-day 0.1 --title BotsWork --auto-skip-seconds 1 --file-idle-time 0 --key -1920x1080 -o - | ffmpeg -y -r 60 -f image2pipe -vcodec ppm -i - -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 1 -threads 4 -bf 0  ./tmp/FullHD.mp4
scripts.visAllMeta: gource --hide mouse,progress,filenames --filename-time 10 --font-colour 87ceeb --highlight-colour BFC8D1 --disable-input --camera-mode overview --background 1b2634 --seconds-per-day 0.1 --title BotsWork --auto-skip-seconds 1 --file-idle-time 0 --key -1920x1080 -o - | ffmpeg -y -r 60 -f image2pipe -vcodec ppm -i - -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 1 -threads 4 -bf 0  ./tmp/all_meta.mp4
scripts.docker-vis: docker run --rm -it --name dcv -v .:/input pmsipilot/docker-compose-viz render -m image docker-compose.yml
